channel.title: CVE Feed for martynasma -- amCharts: Charts and Maps
channel.description: The latest CVEs for martynasma -- amCharts: Charts and Maps

item.title: CVE-2024-8622|2024-09-12T08:30:45.472Z -- martynasma -- amcharts%3A%20charts%20and%20maps
item.description: The amCharts: Charts and Maps plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the 'amcharts_javascript' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.4 due to the ability to supply arbitrary JavaScript a lack of nonce validation on the preview functionality. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
